name: MiaCara
greetingText: (saying just your name didn't feel right:/ )
wishText: May the sunshine always be with you!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns...
text2: Just a message and call doesn't feel enough
text3: But I also don't wanna overstep.
text4: So i decided to take a page out of last year's bday gift that i never got to give you
text4Adjective: and do something simple yet different
text5Content: You are, still, very dear to me
outroText: Drop a text/gimme a call if you liked it...
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
